src:
節電要請、今冬は行わず…供給力確保と判断

06 Nov 2019, 12:22

　経済産業省は６日、電気利用者への今冬（１２月～来年３月）の節電要請は行わないことを決めた。昨冬は北海道地震の影響で安定供給が不安視された北海道に節電要請を行ったが、この冬は２年ぶりに全国すべての地域で十分な供給力を確保できると判断した。
　大手１０電力会社の供給力にどれだけ余裕があるかを示す「予備率」が、安定供給に必要とされる３％を上回るメドが立った。暖房需要の高まりで需給が最も逼迫（ひっぱく）する２月でも、全国で平均６・６％（沖縄を除く）の予備率を確保できるとしている。
text:
Power saving request, not done this winter ... Judged to secure supply capacity

06 Nov 2019, 12:22

The Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry decided on the 6th that electricity users will not be asked to save electricity this winter (December-next March). Last winter, a request was made to save electricity in Hokkaido, where stable supply was considered uneasy due to the impact of the Hokkaido earthquake, but this winter, for the first time in two years, it was judged that sufficient supply could be secured in all regions of the country.
The “reserve rate”, which indicates how much supply capacity of the major 10 electric power companies can afford, exceeded the 3% required for stable supply. Even in February, when supply and demand are tightest due to rising demand for heating, the average reserve of 6.6% (excluding Okinawa) can be secured nationwide.
